profile_report_audio::clip_card_1::goals: Use your own voice or ask your character to introduce themself.
profile_report_audio::clip_card_12::goal: Ask: Can you please tell us about your future?
profile_report_audio::clip_card_4::goals: Record sound of your character completing the action.
profile_report_audio::clip_card_11::goal: Record sound of something important to the character.
profile_report_audio::clip_card_10::goal: Record sounds of what your character does for fun.
profile_report_audio::clip_card_0::goals: Record sounds of a place important to your character.
profile_report_audio::clip_card_9::goals: Record sounds of how people respond to the character.
profile_report_audio::clip_card_13::goal: Tell us yourself what you think will happen next to your character.
profile_report_audio::clip_card_7::goals: Record sounds of the most important thing about your character’s story.
profile_report_audio::clip_card_8::goals: Record sound of your character interacting with other people.
profile_report_audio::clip_card_14::goal: Record sounds of where your character ends the story.
profile_report_audio::clip_card_3::goals: Record sounds of something your character does that’s significant.
profile_report_audio::clip_card_6::goals: Ask: Can you please tell us a little about what you do?
profile_report_audio::clip_card_2::goals: Record sound of something notable about your character.
profile_report_audio::clip_card_15::goal: Record sound of your character at the end of the story.
profile_report_audio::clip_card_5::goals: Tell us why your character is interesting.
